listing.listing_description: Kir Royale takes its cue from the mid-century modern architecture that dots the landscape of Palm Springs’, Vista Las Palmas neighborhood. This elegant villa rises from the foothills of Mount San Jacinto to reveal its unique design and seamless indoor/outdoor living spaces to the world. Let this spacious, four-bedroom home be your desert oasis.The villa features top-shelf amenities that will make your stay unforgettable. Savor the tranquil ambiance around the pool as you sun yourself on a designer chaise longue or daybed. You’ll also find a tanning shelf, to ensure an even California tan. Cool off with a dip in the pool, or under the refreshing spray of a misting system. At night you can walk up to the elevated spa and relax under the stars or host a gathering by the glow of a gas firepit. The open-air living room will allow you to maximize your outdoor experience. It houses comfortable seating, and kitchenette with barbecue.The interior blends modern and Regency-style décor to perfection, creating an atmosphere of vintage luxury. A spiral staircase with walnut steps anchors the home. Terrazzo floors lead you from room to room where you’ll discover plush sofas, subtly installed electronics, fireplaces housed in custom walls and designer lamps and chandeliers. The gourmet kitchen features Boffi fixtures and high-end appliances, making cooking a pleasure. Contemplate the desert-view from the yoga and meditation room.The Master bedroom occupies the upper lever and opens onto a private deck, with exterior stairs leading down to the pool terrace. Its well-appointed en-suite holds a spa-shower and free-standing tub. The second and third bedrooms are on the ground floor, each with a Queen bed, en-suite and access to the pool. The remaining room is in a charming, self-contained casita with a private patio, kitchenette and en-suite.You won’t have to look far for activities in Palm Springs. Start with a stroll around Vista Las Palmas and the Movie Colony neighborhoods and experience mid-century homes that drew Hollywood’s elite to the desert. The Coachella Valley is home to over 80 golf courses set against breathtaking backdrops. You’ll also find national parks with hikes for all skill levels. Shop and dine at the eclectic shops and restaurants along Palm Canyon Drive.Palm Springs Registered Tax Number: 3031Palm Springs City ID: 202Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: World-class skiing awaits at this mountainside lodge hidden away in the Bachelor’s Gulch neighborhood, 6 minutes from Avon. Late nights with family and friends are all but guaranteed beneath the soaring-ceilings of this inviting, social setting. In the morning, hit the slopes with a 5-minute walk to Roughlock Ski Run at Beaver Creek. Vail, Copper Mountian, and Lionshead are nearby as well. On your way home, stop in at the Ritz Carlton’s pool and hot tub, where you’ll have shared access. Then, warm yourself by the imposing, natural stone fireplace after a day on the mountain. Before dinner, gather around the marble bar in the farm-style kitchen and recount tales from the ski slopes. Later, stretch out on the stately leather sofa and bask in the villa’s traditional alpine style. In the warmer months, move the party to the outdoor lounge and fire up the barbecue for lunch. In the summertime, Colorado’s rolling fairways, dynamic shifts in elevation, and tricky hole placement offer a challenge to golfers of every skill level. After a round, head to Avon or Beaver Creek for lunch at a craft brew-pub. Take the kids skating at the Beaver Creek Ice Rink. Then, drive 13-km to check out the newest ski gear, sit down for dinner, or dance the night away in Vail Village. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Dream Maker Villa is a fabulous private home in Scottsdale, Arizona, about seven miles from the city's downtown district, and a short drive from several renowned golf clubs. Ideal for an unforgettable getaway with family or friends, the villa is loaded with amenities for relaxation and play, including an outdoor hot tub and swimming pool, a putting green, numerous game courts, superb living and dining areas, an alfresco bar, and two kitchens (indoor and outdoor). With five ample bedrooms—including a kid-friendly bunk room—the villa comfortably accommodates families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to fourteen in size.The estate forms a private, resort-style oasis in the Arizona desert, surrounded by gorgeous mountain vistas. Enjoy games of volleyball, Frisbee golf, pickle ball, foosball, basketball, cornhole, and more, and practice your short game on the lush green. Bask in the sunlight on lounge chairs and plunge into the refreshing pool. Fire up the barbeque and mix cocktails at the bar, and gather for memorable meals in the fresh desert air. Sip wine around the fire pit at night, or crawl into the hot tub for a soak beneath the stars.The interiors are beautifully furnished in a modern style, appointed with superb media technologies, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and multiple fireplaces. The centerpiece is a spacious and luminous kitchen, fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, gleaming white-marble countertops, and a breakfast bar. The separate entertainment room includes a classy pool table, fireplace, and TV lounge. The villa also features an office and gym.The master bedroom includes a king bed and deluxe ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, rain shower, and freestanding tub. Three of the guest suites feature split-king beds that can be arranged as pairs of twins. Two of these rooms have ensuite bathrooms, while the third shares a bathroom with the bunkroom (which sleeps four children). There is also a twin-size bed and a trundle bed in the office. All of the rooms have air conditioning and TVs.Dream Maker Villa is just four minutes from Orange Tree Golf Club, five minutes from Camelback Golf Club, and ten minutes from Paradise Valley Country Club. The downtown districts of Scottsdale and Phoenix are both within easy reach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A watchful zebra is a note of wildness in the otherwise-refined rooms of this modern estate 20 minutes west of downtown Austin. Leather sofas, vintage rugs, and patterned tile feel contemporary-chic downstairs, and a sweeping staircase leads to bedrooms upstairs. Look out over Texas hills from the back of a swan float in the pool and drive 12 miles for a swim in the 3-acre Barton Springs Pool.Watch the sun move across the trees from hillside living areas with a swimming pool, loungers, and an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue. As the lights switch on in the city below, heat up the grill for dinner or go inside to sip drinks from the bar, watch the cable TV, play impromptu tournaments on the pool and shuffleboard tables, and share holiday photos via Wi-Fi.Cool tones of gray, charcoal, and white, along with high ceilings, give the living areas an airy feel, while details like hardwood floors and leather sofas add balancing touches of warmth. The formal living and dining rooms are open to each other, and there’s a separate open-concept family room and fully equipped kitchen, including a breakfast bar.This vacation rental has 4 bedrooms with king beds; 3 have ensuite bathrooms, including a master bedroom with a honeymoon-suite-worthy jetted tub and its own private lounge area and balcony. The fourth bedroom shares a Jack-and-Jill-style bathroom with bedroom 5, which has a queen bed. A spare room with a double size bed and two bunk beds can accommodate those extra guests.From the quiet hilltop setting of this luxury property, it’s less than 10 miles to the nearest golf course and less than 15 miles to Zilker Metropolitan Park, whose nearly 400 acres are studded with paddler-friendly Lady Bird Lake and local-favorite Barton Springs Pool. Drive 15 miles to downtown Austin for a free tour of the Texas State Capitol building and a night out sampling the town’s restaurants, bars, and live-music venues.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Flowing water joins the birds and wind on the soundtrack to this mid-century bungalow 5 miles north of downtown Austin. Mature oak trees shade the yard and frame vistas over the hills, and while the villa itself is 60 years old, it’s been refreshed with an open-concept layout. Hike Mount Bonnell, 2 miles away, for even more panoramic views, or drive into Austin proper for barbecue, bars, and more.Listen to the breeze ruffle the leaves from a swimming pool with a water feature, a row of loungers on the sunny and private back deck, and shaded alfresco sitting and dining areas with a barbecue, firepit, and outdoor TV. After a day out in the city, start a sing-along around the grand piano, cozy up to the wood-burning fireplace, sip a glass from the wine fridge while watching the streaming TV, and catch up with your feeds over Wi-Fi.At the heart of this vacation rental is an L-shaped great room whose open-concept family room, dining area, and fully equipped kitchen feel decidedly 21st century. The furnishings, however, nod to the mid-century roots, with a walnut sideboard and Wishbone-inspired bar stools. A separate formal living room has the piano and a temptingly deep blue sofa.This luxury property has 1 master bedroom with a king bed, ensuite bathroom, and balcony. There are 2 bedrooms with queen beds that share access to a hall bathroom, and 1 bedroom with a king bed and hall bathroom that also has its own entrance.Spend your holiday hiking Mount Bonnell, swimming in the 3-acre Barton Springs Pool, and strolling alongside locals through Zilker Metropolitan Park, all less than 10 miles away. Drive downtown for a free tour of the Texas State Capitol building and stay there for a night out, or sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner on a lantern-lit deck over the waters of Lake Austin.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take a ski break close to both the mountains and Main Street at Morning Star Lodge in Breckenridge. Its location in the exclusive Highlands neighborhood puts you close to several ski lifts, downtown and even a golf course. With five bedrooms, spacious interiors designed by Suzanne Allen-Guerra and luxurious outdoor living spaces, the villa can welcome the whole family in comfort.After a day on the slopes or the golf course, return to the lodge to relax in the hot tub, prep dinner on the gas barbecue, dine on the deck and cozy up to the outdoor gas fireplace. Inside, you’ll find a recreation room with a Wii, games table and shuffleboard, cable television and high-speed Internet access and a wet bar. Ski storage and a washer and dryer make it easy to stash and clean equipment.The lofty interiors of Morning Star Lodge are rustic yet bright, with soaring ceilings and large windows with views of a pine grove and mountains. The double-height living room features cozy leather sofas and chairs gathered around a custom stone fireplace. The dining room, set between the living room and kitchen, is lined with tall windows and suede chairs to create a comfortable space that feels perched among the trees. The stunning kitchen is fully equipped and has a breakfast bar with rich leather stools.There are two master suites at Morning Star Lodge: one on the main floor and one upstairs. On the main floor, the master bedroom has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet and patio access; on the upper floor, the master bedroom has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, mini-fridge and its own private entrance. The other three bedrooms are on the lower level: one with queen and twin beds, an en-suite bathroom and patio access; one with a double bed and shared bathroom and one with a twin bunk bed and shared bathroom. A twin trundle bed is also available in the fifth bedroom.If you’ve come to the Rockies to ski, you’ll find the BreckConnect gondola 1.5 miles from the villa, the Snowflake and Quicksilver Super 6 lifts 2 miles away and the Peak 8 base at Breckenridge Ski Resort 3.5 miles away. Copper Mountain, 17 miles away, and Vail Ski Resort, 37 miles away, are well worth the drive. If the weather is warmer, head to Main Street, 1 mile from the villa, or Breckenridge Golf Club, 3.5 miles away. Upon arrival or departure, it’s a 103-mile drive from Denver International Airport to Morning Star Lodge.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Dramatic mountain views take center stage at Governors Penthouse 401. From your perch in the heart of downtown Steamboat Springs, take in beautiful vistas of the Yampa River, Howelsen Hill and Emerald Mountain. Spend your holiday skiing, golfing, rafting or soaking in the town’s namesake hot springs. At the end of a day of the outdoor adventures in Colorado, bliss out with this vacation rental’s luxury amenities and and three bedrooms.Leave your car in the underground parking space and let the elevator whisk you up to the penthouse, where a sprawling private deck awaits. On warmer nights, prepare dinner on the barbecue, sit down at the al-fresco dining area and end the evening with a marshmallow roast over the firepit; when it’s colder outside, enjoy a soak under the stars in the hot tub.An expansive open-plan great room bordered by floor-to-ceiling windows lets you bring the whole family together—and appreciate the mountain views. Stretch out on the sectional in front of the fireplace and flat-screen television, set up a board game on the round table by the window, or toast to a special occasion around the dining table, which has seating for eight. A breakfast bar and gourmet appliances in the fully equipped kitchen make it easy to satisfy après-ski appetites.The warm contemporary feel of Governors Penthouse 401 continues in the three bedrooms, from a master suite with a king bed and en-suite bathroom to two bedrooms with a queen bed and bunk beds, respectively, that share a bathroom. In the bathroom, touches like glass-enclosed showers and stand-alone bathtubs with views of their own invite you to linger.The penthouse is part of the Olympian complex in downtown Steamboat Springs, just a 5-minute drive or seasonal shuttle ride from shopping and dining and 10 minutes from Steamboat Ski Resort. Avid skiers can test their skills on runs that have hosted World Cup competitions, while summer visitors can choose from a wealth of activities ranging from golf and kayaking to rafting on the Yampa River. Not to be missed are the town’s hot springs, whether you take the kids to splash in the pools at Old Town or your sweetheart for a honeymoon-worthy soak at Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Belle Epoque French elegance meets contemporary luxury in this newly built Beverly Hills estate. Wrought-iron railings, a stained-glass dome, and inlaid marble floors form the European-inspired setting for a state-of-the-art home theater and professional-grade appliances like a La Cornue range. This wood-paneled haven, however, is only a 5-minute drive from the big-name boutiques of Rodeo Drive. Along with nearly 12,000 square feet of living space, this vacation rental boasts outdoor living areas with a heated pool, hot tub, an al-fresco kitchen with a barbecue, loungers in the California sun, and a shaded sitting area. Inside, the amenities range from a home theater and wine cellar to a beautifully paneled home office, satellite TV, and Wi-Fi. Double doors open to a double-height foyer whose sweeping wrought-iron staircase draws the eye up to the stained-glass cupola. There are formal living and dining areas just off the entry, or you can follow the arched hallway to a family room and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and a dining nook. High ceilings throughout add a sense of spaciousness, while wood and marble floors are luxe underfoot. The estate has three bedrooms with king beds and private en-suite bathrooms, as well as a fourth king bedroom that shares a bathroom with a bedroom with two twin beds. Two staff rooms, each with a double bed and shared bathroom, mean there’s flexibility for larger groups on holiday together. Haute Beverly is only a 5-minute drive from the haute couture of Rodeo Drive, and 10 miles or less from local must-sees such as the Los Angeles County Museum of Art, the Getty Center, Griffith Observatory, and Universal Studios. Hike through Runyon Canyon Park or relive your honeymoon on a sunset stroll along the beach in Santa Monica or Venice. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: World-class golf and shopping, unforgettable performances at the Coachella festival or on the Empire Polo Grounds, the otherworldly scenery of Joshua Tree National Park: they’re all at the doorstep of Mirador. Whether you’re coming to Indio for a special occasion, an event or just a little California sunshine, this luxury vacation rental is a private oasis in the Desert Cities.Spend the day on the fairways or festival grounds, then return to cool off in the pool or have a nap on one of the loungers on the terrace. Heat up the barbecue and serve dinner at the outdoor table, then watch the stars come out from around the firepit or in the private hot tub. If you’d prefer to unwind or entertain indoors, there’s a games room with vintage and modern options, a surround sound system and Wi-Fi.From its charming Mediterranean-style facade to its inviting contemporary interiors, Mirador packs a serious style punch. The heart of the villa is an open-plan great room with a sitting area, dining area and a fully equipped kitchen. Details such as a geometric rug, shag-topped footstools, a globe chandelier and a wall of white subway tile give the space a fresh yet welcoming feel.The villa’s five bedrooms—four in the main house and one in a casita—can accommodate up to ten friends or extended family on holiday together. In the main house, you’ll find two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and two bedrooms with a queen and two double beds, respectively, with hall bathrooms. With its king bed, en-suite bathroom and direct terrace access, the casita could double as a honeymoon-style retreat.Mirador is a 10-minute drive or less from three golf courses, the Coachella festival grounds, and shopping and dining in both downtown Indio and Old Town La Quinta. Drive a bit farther and you’ll come to the Indian Wells Tennis Garden, home to the BNP Paribas Open, and several more golf courses. For a memorable day trip, explore the mid-century architecture of Palm Springs or the totally natural (and often stark) scenery of Joshua Tree National Park.City ID # 19-00021223Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Designed for entertaining in full view of the mountains, Clowsgill Holme is the perfect retreat for a family reunion or fun-filled holiday with friends. This custom log home features spacious yet cozy interiors, plenty of picture windows and finely wrought post and beam construction. Its location on Baldy Mountain is only minutes from skiing, hiking, biking, the quaint town of Breckenridge and more, putting you close to the Colorado outdoors any time of year.After a day on the trails, leave gear in the mudroom and watch the sunset from the villa’s private deck, which has a barbecue, al-fresco dining for eight and a hot tub. If it’s too chilly outside, opt for a snug evening indoors by the glow of the fireplace and flat-screen television.Clowsgill Holme pairs rustic elements with modern furnishings for comfortable yet stylish interiors. Thick wooden beams and a stone fireplace fill the living room with natural texture, while tufted leather sofas are soft and inviting. Both the pedestal table in the formal dining area and the farmhouse-inspired table in the breakfast nook have views of the mountains. And the fully equipped kitchen has both on-trend granite countertops and state-of-the-art appliances.The five bedrooms at this luxury vacation rental can accommodate up to fourteen guests. There are three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, including a plush master suite with its own fireplace and steam shower, and two that share a hall bathroom. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms feature weighty wood beams from British Columbia redwoods and floors in warm-toned reclaimed wood.The villa’s perch on Baldy Mountain is only 10 minutes from the nearest ski area and steps from cross-country, hiking and biking trails. Bring the family to Carter Park for sledding and tubing, or your sweetheart to Breckenridge’s historic downtown for a honeymoon-style stroll past shops and restaurants. For warm-weather guests, the Breckenridge Golf Club is just a short drive from Clowsgill Holme.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Look out onto slopes that are just minutes away at Breck Escape. While this Colorado vacation rental feels secluded, it’s a 10-minute drive or less from skiing, golf, and shopping and dining along Main Street in Breckenridge. With open-concept living areas and six bedrooms, the villa has plenty of space for groups of up to eighteen friends or extended family.For summer visitors, the villa has furnished outdoor living areas with a barbecue and hot tub. If you’re here for the skiing, leave gear in the mud room, pour a glass from the wine cooler and relax after a day on the slopes with the help of the steam room, pool table, cable TV and Wi-Fi.A bright, airy great room gives you the luxury of enough space for everyone to be together. Cozy up to the fireplace in the sitting area or watch the snow fall on the trees outside, plan the next day’s adventures around the dining table or pause for a snack at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. The separate media room is just the right place for kids to watch a movie while the grown-ups catch up.Breck Escape has four bedrooms with king beds and private en-suite bathrooms, including a master suite with honeymoon-suite-worthy details like a fireplace and lounge area. The fifth bedroom has a queen bed, twin bunk bed and en-suite bathroom, making it perfect for parents traveling with younger children. For older kids, there’s a bunk room with two twin bunk beds and two trundle beds.Start each day of your ski holiday by making the 8-minute drive to the BreckConnect gondola or the 10-minute drive to the base of Breckenridge Ski Resort. For après-ski shopping and dining, it’s only 10 minutes to the town’s Main Street and the Breckenridge National Historic District. In warmer weather, it’s a 9-minute trip to the Breckenridge Golf Club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Listen to the hush that settles over the mountains while the snow falls at Chalet Tarentaise. Nicknamed “the birdhouse” for its unique shape and hillside perch, this contemporary Colorado vacation rental affords 270-degree views that sweep from the valley to the ski slopes. It’s tucked into a quiet neighborhood so you can enjoy the scenery in peace, but is only a short drive from the skiing, dining, shopping and more in central Steamboat Springs.Winter stays at the chalet include shuttle service and continental breakfast. The villa’s deck features a private hot tub where you can watch the stars or the latest snowfall. (For summer visitors, there’s also a barbecue.) Entertaining indoors is a snap thanks to a TV, fireplace and Wi-Fi, while a ski storage area and boot dryers ensure everyone’s convenience and comfort.Behind the unusual façade of this luxury villa, you’ll find a classic great room with an open-plan living area, dining area and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. Wood floors and a stone fireplace surround lend natural texture to the space, while leather sofas and dining chairs tie the different areas together.The four bedrooms at Chalet Tarentaise can accommodate up to ten guests—enough room for an extended family or a holiday shared by several couples. There are two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed and a second bedroom with a queen bed. The other two bedrooms share a bathroom and have a queen bed and a king bed (or two twin beds), respectively.During ski season, the complimentary shuttle will take you the 5 minutes to Steamboat Ski Resort or make the 8-minute drive to the nearest grocery store. In the summer, it’s an easy 9 minutes to the scenic Rollingstone Ranch golf course. No matter what time of year you visit, be sure to spend an afternoon splashing in the pools at Steamboat Springs Old Town or a honeymoon-worthy evening soaking underneath the stars at Strawberry Park’s hot springs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A burbling creek, swaying aspens and the silent, stately Gros Ventre mountain range are your neighbors at the private Fish Creek Lodge 2. Newly built in a peaceful setting outside Teton Village, this Jackson Hole vacation rental is a year-round retreat that’s perfect for family trips to Grand Teton National Park in the summer or ski holidays with friends in the winter. But despite the wild surroundings, three suite-style bedrooms, beautiful finishes and state-of-the-art touches provide plenty of luxury.The stone-and-timber lodge is a cozy sanctuary in the shadow of the Tetons, with a welcoming fireplace, a separate media room for curling up in front of a favorite movie and, of course, Wi-Fi, so you’re never far from friends. In warmer weather, heat up the barbecue, gather at the outdoor dining area on the stone terrace and watch the stars come out from the Adirondack chairs or the hot tub. Kids will love toasting marshmallows in the outdoor fireplace.Rough-cut timber, barn doors and a stone fireplace surround play off soft upholstery, graphic area rugs and playful floor lamps for a mountain lodge look with a modern twist. The great room at Fish Creek Lodge 2 soars thirty feet high and is flooded with light—and views—from the floor-to-ceiling window. No matter what the weather in Wyoming, you’ll be comfortable in a leather armchair by the fire or a refined nailhead-trim seat around the dining table. Even the fully equipped kitchen pairs the rustic with the state of the art, blending weathered wood panels and barn lights with a quilted-steel backsplash and Wolf range.Each of the lodge’s three bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom; two have king beds worthy of a honeymoon suite, and the third has two bunk beds. There’s also a king sofa bed in the media room for larger parties. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms mix the traditional and contemporary, with touches like stone fireplaces, wood floors and wool blankets to provide pops of color.Though the villa’s setting feels secluded, it’s not isolated. In the summer, ride the nearby Jackson Hole bike path into downtown Jackson or all the way to Grand Teton National Park; in the winter, there’s a complimentary ski shuttle to transport you to the base of Jackson Hole Mountain Resort. For an entirely different mode of transportation, try a paragliding session from a nearby hillside into the meadows near the villa. Test your skill on the landscapes of the two nearby golf courses, soak in a natural pool at Granite Hot Springs or visit the relatively untamed nature of Yellowstone National Park. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 14-mile drive from the lodge to Jackson Hole Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The Parkite is a high-end condominium project at the heart of Historic Main Street in Park City. Located just a short walk from Town Lift, the state-of-the-art building provides guests with deluxe shared amenities, cutting-edge sustainable design, and luxurious residences to enjoy a private vacation. This exquisite, two-bedroom, two-bath residence is ideal for small families or groups of friends. Features include gorgeous and sumptuous interior living areas, an alfresco deck with private hot tub, and top-of-the-line amenities and appliances, along with access to the Parkite's shared amenities and services.The alfresco patio invites you to breathe the delicious air, sip wine on the sofa, and gaze on the gorgeous views of the mountains and town. Step into the seven-person hot tub after the day's exertions, and start the grill for a barbeque dinner. On quiet afternoons, relax with a hot cocoa in the charming eggshell swing.Stepping inside to the open-concept living area, you'll find a comfy and elegant lounge with large TV, ideal for kindling a fire and relaxing with your favorite shows. The gourmet kitchen is fully equipped with top-shelf appliances, while the dining table is a lovely setting for delicious feasts together. Large windows fill the villa's interior with alpine light, while the décor combines contemporary elegance with classic chalet comfort and charm.The master suite features a sumptuous king bed, ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub, and direct access to the balcony and hot tub. The guest suite includes two lovely queen beds, an ensuite bathroom, and gorgeous sunset views. There is an additional queen sofa bed in the living roomThe Parkite enjoys an ample roof deck with two fire pits as well as dining areas. There is also a fitness center and a deluxe lounge in the lobby. Your vacation rental includes one spot in the underground parking garage. Leaving the Parkite, you're about seven minutes on foot from Town Lift and a five-minute drive from the Park City Resort Base. Deer Valley and Brighton are also close by, as is Park City Golf Course, Park Silly Sunday Market, and numerous other attractions that make this city one of the finest ski capitals in the Rocky Mountains.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Relax in a quintessential Napa and Sonoma estate at Knights Valley Vista. This spectacular vacation rental has it all: dramatic views of the landscape and vineyards, luxury amenities, magazine-worthy style and a charmingly rural location just outside the town of Calistoga. Plan your California wine country escape with a group of up to eight friends or family members.Knights Valley Vista sits on more than 200 private acres overlooking Mt. St. Helena, lined with seven miles of hiking paths that meander through vineyards of Cabernet Sauvignon, Malbec and Chardonnay. The grounds also feature a swimming pool, hot tub, bocce court, lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and a firepit. For your evening entertainment, there’s a satellite TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi.Designed for indoor-outdoor living that takes full advantage of the gorgeous setting, the villa is laid out around an expansive open-concept great room. Here, stone walls frame the living area, dining area, and fully equipped kitchen, and several sets of doors lead to the outdoor areas. A recent renovation added luxe finishes such as marble countertops and intricate tilework.The main house at Knights Valley Vista has a honeymoon-worthy master bedroom with a king bed, en-suite bedroom, fireplace and private access to the terrace with the hot tub. The other two bedrooms are in a guest house; one has a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and the other has a queen bed and shared access to a hall bathroom. For larger parties, an office in the main house has a queen Murphy bed.While you could easily spend your holiday simply exploring the villa’s grounds, it’s well worth taking a drive to nearby towns. Knights Valley Vista is less than a 5-mile drive from Calistoga, and less than a 20-mile drive from both Oakville and Santa Rosa. Leave time to stop off at the wineries you pass along the way—or to simply pause and take in the views.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Modern style meets timeless mountain scenery at Hawks Hideaway. Designed by California’s Pinnacle Design Studio, this luxury home puts a fresh spin on the ski-lodge look. Not only does its location afford incredible views of the peaks around Breckenridge, it puts you and up to twenty friends or family members just minutes from skiing, sledding and more.There’s ample space at this Colorado vacation rental to entertain and relax. On warmer days, take in the views from the private deck, which has a barbecue, hot tub and firepit. In cooler weather, grown-ups will appreciate the sound system, wine fridge and fireplace, while kids will want to hang out in the lower-level media room.The open-plan great room at Hawks Hideaway places living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen in one space that’s big enough for everyone. Picture windows overlooking the mountains and a stone fireplace provide dual focal points, and a sectional and built-in window seat are the perfect spots to take them in. Unique wingback chairs elegantly mark the head and foot of the dining table, which seats twelve. The kitchen has gourmet appliances, wide stretches of countertop and a convenient breakfast bar.En-suite bathrooms in all six bedrooms ensure that everyone has a comfortable holiday. There are four bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with its own fireplace and balcony. The other two bedrooms, which each have two bunk beds, are ideal for kids.Though Hawks Hideaway is tucked into a quiet pine grove, you can use the villa as a honeymoon from real life or to take advantage of the best of Breckenridge. Ski areas, sledding and tubing, and even golf are all just a short drive away. Don’t miss charming downtown Breckenridge, which has one of the largest historic districts in the state.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Ski-in, ski-out access, luxury amenities and cozy interiors will have you falling for Skyfall Ridge 702. Part of the Edgemont community in Steamboat Springs, this refined Colorado vacation rental is just steps from both the Stampede ski run at Steamboat Ski Resort and exclusive community features. Book the two-bedroom villa for a quiet parents-and-kids ski break or a honeymoon in the mountains.Your holiday at Skyfall Ridge 702 includes access to the shared heated outdoor pool, hot tub and ski storage at Edgemont, as well as a complimentary seasonal shuttle. After a day on the slopes, bring the kids to the outdoor firepit for s’mores and hot chocolate, or unwind by the fireplace in the communal lounge. For private evenings in, the villa has its own balcony with a barbecue and mountain views and, inside, a wine cooler, fireplace and flat-screen television that will tempt you to curl up and relax.The villa’s interiors put a modern twist on traditional mountain lodge style. The open-plan great room boasts vaulted, beamed ceilings, plenty of windows with panoramic views and soft, neutral tones for a quietly stylish vibe. The sitting and dining areas share the double-sided fireplace, so you can listen to the flames crackle from the large sectional or the nailhead-trimmed dining chairs. A breakfast bar and office nook mean that other guests can keep the cook company in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen.Even the bedrooms at Skyfall Ridge 702 have mountain views. The master suite is well appointed with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, fireplace and its own door to the balcony. If you’re traveling as a family or as a groupe of friends, the second bedroom is well equipped with a double size bunk bed, balcony access and a hall bathroom.One of the biggest perks of staying at Edgemont is the ski-in, ski-out access to the Stampede run via the ground floor of the complex. The community is also conveniently close to the shopping and dining in the mountain village. During the warmer months, use the villa as a base for rounds of golf at the nearby Rollingstone Ranch course or rafting, kayaking and fishing expeditions on the Yampa River. No matter what time of year you visit, you’ll always find naturally heated mineral waters and a laid-back ambience at the Old Town and Strawberry Park hot springs, just a short drive from the property.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Recharge in the peace of the desert with this private and well-equipped Coachella Valley villa. The sun-reflecting pool is ringed by stone seats and shaded lounge areas, with the lofty mountains visible just beyond the villa’s tall palm trees. Relax at the mosaic-tiled villa bar or in the leafy gardens, before taking on local golf courses, wilderness hikes and the local bar and restaurant scene.Breathe in the balmy desert air from the shaded environs of the plush chairs and sofas of the Noman Estate’s shaded terrace, and plan a day to remember in this famous Californian valley. Guests will appreciate the inventive and colorful decor that runs throughout the vibrant living space, which is decked out in premium furniture, shining glass and polished wood. Air-conditioned bedrooms offer a solid night’s sleep, while the premium barbecue will fire up a delicious meal that can be enjoyed at the social bar outside, as the pool lights shine and stars peek out from the blue/red veil of the evening sky.Literally 2 minutes from the Coachella Valley Music and Arts site, guests at Nomad Estate can take in the desert landscapes and delightful picnic spots of the Thousand Palms Oasis Preserve. A dizzying selection of premium golf courses are within a 10 minutes drive, ranging from dynamic hillside courses to sweeping valley fairways. After a stimulating walk to a viewpoint in the nearby hills, hit downtown Indio for a delicious Western-style meal and tasty glass of locally-brewed beer or Californian wine.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.City permit #20-00025920

listing.listing_description: Backed by the beautiful San Sophia Ridgeline in Mountain Village, Petra Domus is a breathtaking alpine chalet whose majestic beauty is mirrored only by its incredible surroundings. During your stay at this private vacation rental, you will be located just a mile from the Intercept Gondola. Once a remote mining area, today Telluride has become a favorite holiday destination for artists, skiers and celebrities. The freedom of luxuriant powder days and the bonhomie of its famed festivals make Telluride a great bet – any season!French doors off the great room lead to the large outdoor deck. Under a protective eve, an outdoor sofa, chairs and coffee table create an outdoor living space around a beautiful stone fireplace. Further out on the deck is a dining table for up to six and a gas grill. An outdoor hot tub awaits to help you melt those cares away. Inside, the wet bar may soon become the favorite haunt of the consummate entertainer. Other perks include Wi-Fi and a foosball table.Upon entering the stone house, guests are welcomed by hardwood floors along with exquisite furnishings and finishes. The spacious great room features vaulted ceilings and plenty living space. Two comfortable sofas and armchairs surround a massive stone fireplace and a hidden flat screen television. A breakfast nook is positioned in the corner of the room with a leather bench and two chairs. A lovely dining table for eight sits adjacent to the gourmet kitchen with granite countertops and Viking stainless steel appliances.Four exquisite bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to ten guests at this non-smoking villa. Three suites are located in the main house, and the fourth is in a separate guest house with a kitchenette. The master suite includes a king bed, steam shower and fireplace. The bunk suite doubles as an entertainment room for the children.Whether it’s for a golf retreat or a ski vacation, your entire family is sure to fall in love with this luxury home. You will be a jaunt from both the Mountain Village Core and the Telluride Golf Course. Or for a trip into the past and a look at how mining used to be, be sure to check out the Alta Lakes Ghost Town tour. Great for a wedding or any special event, enjoy the quintessential alpine experience at Petra Domus!TMVBL#005628Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Secluded amid aspen and pine woods near Teton Village, Holly Haus is located just three minutes from Jackson Hole Mountain Resort and about a mile from Shooting Star Golf Club. The modern, chalet-style home offers ample space and resort-like features including an alfresco hot tub and cavernous great room, while its four gorgeous bedrooms include a spacious master suite and a kid-friendly bunk room, accommodating ten guests in all.The villa's main living areas are located on the upper level. Cathedral windows gaze out from the vaulted great room into the rich forest, while a gorgeous stone hearth with wood-burning fireplace warms the open-concept space. The luminous kitchen features chef-grade appliances and an island bar, and easily serves the dining table and lounge. Glass doors open to the upper-level deck, where a dining table welcomes alfresco feasts on warm summer evenings. The stand-alone spa is located on the patio below, beckoning you to a starlit soak in the crisp, pine-scented air.Sharing the upper level with the great room, the master suite enjoys high, vaulted ceilings, ample windows, and doors to the deck, while its spacious ensuite bathroom includes dual vanities, a steam shower, and a jetted soaking tub with lovely forest views. On the ground floor, the primary guest suite features a king bed and ensuite bathroom, while the other two rooms—one with queen bed, one with two bunk beds (sleeping four)—share a bathroom between them, forming an ideal family suite. These lower-level rooms open to the patio and hot tub.Holly Haus offers an extraordinary balance of seclusion and convenience, with a prime location just four minutes from the heart of Teton Village and three minutes from Jackson Hole Mountain Resort. Outstanding hiking trails can be accessed from the property, while the fairways of Shooting Star are just over a mile away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located right on Park City’s Historic Main Street, within a short stroll of boutique shops and restaurants, as well as two of Park City Resort’s most popular ski access points, this luxurious two-bedroom has it all. Perfect for an exciting honeymoon, family ski vacation, or couples retreat, both of Parkite’s private bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and either a king or queen sized bed. With such an incredibly convenient location, you’ll have no trouble hitting the slopes first thing in the morning, and enjoying the vibrant nightlife of Park City, Utah.Parkite on Main Two Zero takes the modernized alpine luxury to new levels with its elegant white color scheme, designer furnishings, and contemporary accent pieces. Even the brick fireplaces have a modern twist to them, while still providing that rustic, warm feeling that only a roaring fire can. The open concept layout makes the living room a great social environment, perfect for gathering with the family and telling stories from an exciting day on the mountain.This ultra-modern alpine home comes equipped with cable and Apple TV, an integrated sound system, Wi-Fi, and air conditioning. In the kitchen, you’ll love the stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, wine cooler, and granite island countertop that doubles as a breakfast bar. Outside, you’ll have an incredible view of the city from the relaxing hot tub and a furnished outdoor lounge. You’ll also have the use of one space in the building’s underground parking garage.Ski access is easy in Park City, with Town Lift and Park City Mountain Resort Base both within a ten-minute walk. If you’d like to travel a little further, Deer Valley and Canyon’s Village offer even more exciting alpine action, both are located within a short drive. Just downstairs, on Historic Main Street, you’ll find plenty of cafes, restaurants, boutique shops, and local pubs to try out on your unforgettable Park City ski vacation. And, if you’re in town on a summer Sunday, check out the Park Silly Sunday Market and enjoy incredible street performers, live music, local merchants, and plenty of great food.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This luxury vacation home has been featured as "A Dream Vacation Home" in Travel & Leisure Magazine, on NBC's #1 rated news magazine television show Extra!, as an "Ultimate Destination" on NBC's Mansions and Millionaires, on CNN and in Palm Springs Life Magazine.Experience the peace and tranquility of your own oasis retreat, set against the majestic backdrop of rugged mountains and verdant fairways. Contemporary Dream is an elegant, mid-century Palm Springs villa, whose tasteful design creates a seamless indoor to outdoor living experience. The beautiful, three-bedroom home has caught the eye of the world’s lifestyle media, who consider it the ultimate spot for an unforgettable getaway.From the private pool terrace, you’ll understand why people have flocked to Palm Springs for over 100 years. Recline on a comfortable chaise longue and bask in the California sun, as you stare up to the San Jacinto Mountains. Canvas parasols shelter a charming al fresco table, where you and your guests can enjoy fresh ingredients grilled on the barbecue. In the evening, ease into the hot tub with a glass of champagne and relax under the stars.18 ft ceilings, retractable glass walls and clerestory windows provide spectacular views and allow light to stream inside. The villa was designed by a protégé of Frank Lloyd Wright, and features tasteful, modern-contemporary elements. Sandstone floors and earthy hues blend with décor and furniture selected by renowned designer Michael Kreiss, to complete the oasis ambiance. Behind the unique, glass-top dining table, you’ll find a wet bar where you can mix drinks on smooth, granite surfaces. Lovely cabinets and high-end appliances make cooking in the gourmet kitchen a pleasure, and a cozy breakfast table sits adjacent.Contemporary Dream’s three designer bedrooms are all air conditioned and feature original furnishings, soft bed linens, plasma television and direct access to the outdoors. Each houses a luxuriously-appointed en-suite bathroom. The Master bedroom is spacious, with a King size bed. Its en-suite includes a spa-shower and bathtub. The second bedroom also has a King size bed, while the remaining room is a Queen suite.The villa places you in an ideal spot for exploring the beauty of your desert surroundings. Indian Canyons is home to great hiking trails, while a drive to Joshua Tree National Park is a worthwhile day trip. You’re adjacent to Indian Canyons Golf Resort, while dozens of additional courses can be found in the vicinity. The upscale shops, restaurants and nightlife of Palm Canyon Drive are just two miles away.Palm Springs Registered Tax Permit Number: 3031Palm Springs City ID: 197Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Just a short stroll from beautiful downtown Ketchum and the Sun Valley Resort, this private four bedroom has the perfect location for a secluded family getaway while enjoying quick and easy access to shopping, dining, nightlife, and skiing. Within an eight-minute drive, you’ll have access to world-class skiing at Sun Valley Lodge, Bald Mountain, and Dollar Mountain. If you’re traveling in the warmer month, Elkhorn Golf Club is just nine minutes from home. And, there’s plenty more to discover in Sun Valley, no matter what time of the year you’re vacationing.This sleek and stylish villa puts a modern spin on the traditional ski lodge with its clean straight lines, open concept floor plan, and bright, elegant white interior color scheme. The living room is adorned with state of the electronics, designer furnishings, and gorgeous stone mantle with a wood burning fireplace. The vaulted ceiling is extra-high, and the walls underneath are made up of forest view framing glass, setting a warm and inviting tone in the living room that you and your guests will love.Bitterroot is the perfect host for family dinner, with formal and alfresco dining for eight, a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, dishwasher, and barbecue. After your meal, curl up with a good book by the fireplace or settle in for a family movie night in the media room. If you’ve still got some energy to burn, head over to the Sun Valley Lodge, where you’ll have complimentary use of their swimming pool, jacuzzi, and sauna.After you’ve spent some time on the slopes or at one of the nearby golf clubs, reward yourself with a night on the town. Downtown Ketchum, just a four-minute walk from home, has a wide range of dining options, from fine French, Italian, and American restaurants to casual pubs. If you feel like catching one of the latest movies, Magic Lantern Cinemas is delightful old-old-style theatre, great for family outings. And, if you’d like to explore even more of Idaho’s breathtaking environment, Sawtooth National Forest is a great afternoon excursion.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Walk past a gently flowing fountain and a pair of lion statues (said to bring peace and prosperity) to reach the front door of this desert oasis. Upon entering, you’ll find an open-concept living area and formal dining room with antique chairs and a rustic wooden table. Located in the prosperous North Scottsdale neighborhood, you’re close to fine dining, elegant wine bars, and luxury boutiques. Plush furniture, brass chandeliers, and artful accents stand out against a smooth, white colour scheme. Sliding glass doors open up to let the expansive blue skies drench the interior in natural light. Set the alfresco table and dine with your whole crew on the sheltered terrace. A spiral staircase leads to the rooftop lounge—perfect place to stretch out and admire the dramatic sunset over the panoramic vista. Verdant, manicured lawn, sprinkled with desert shrubbery, encompasses the turquoise swimming pool. Feel the tranquility of the property as you walk along rust-hued stones through the pebbled landscaping. Why not end the evening with a soak under the stars in your private azure-tiled hot tub?Nearby Mcdowell Mountain Park is a popular spot for hiking, biking and horseback riding. Your pick of golf clubs are within driving distance, as well as the Camelback Village Racquet and Health Club, Echo Canyon Recreation Area, and Paradise Valley Country Club—there’s no excuse not to stay active. Complete your outing with a stop at a local brewery or quaint café to discover a new favourite, refreshing beverage. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Where the mountains meet downtown you’ll find Main Street Contempo. Though it’s set above the shops and restaurants of Park City’s charming Main Street, this stylish apartment is only a few minutes’ walk from the Park City Town ski lift. Invite up to eleven friends or family members to live like locals at this convenient five-bedroom vacation rental.Watch life unfold in town from a pair of chairs on the street-facing balcony—or see the stars come out during a honeymoon-worthy soak in the hot tub on the private rooftop deck, which also features a barbecue. After a day on the slopes, serve refreshments from the wet bar or wine cooler and settle in front of the gas fireplace and cable TV, all to the strains of the Sonos sound system.Pale wood floors, neutral tones and an open-plan layout give Main Street Contempo its modern flair, while a wall of windows in the great room brings the natural scenery outside into the space as well. A generous sectional and several chairs offer ample seating close to the fireplace and TV, and there’s room for eight around the dining table. A granite-topped breakfast bar and stainless steel appliances make the fully equipped kitchen a pleasure to look at—and to cook in.The five bedrooms at this luxury property all have en-suite bathrooms, making it perfect for groups who want privacy while on holiday. There are three bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with its own fireplace, and one bedroom with a queen bed. Younger guests will want to claim the bunk bed and twin bed in the fifth bedroom as their own.Thanks to its downtown location, Main Street Contempo is only a 2-minute walk from the nearest ski lift, as well as local favorites like the Park Silly Sunday Market. By car, it’s 5 minutes or less to the base of both Park City Mountain Resort and Deer Valley resort, plus, for summer visitors, Park City Golf Course. Don’t miss the chance to visit the nearby Utah Olympic Park, where you can tour the facilities and try out a thrilling bobsled ride.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Looking for late-nights with great friends? This modern villa in the Melrose neighborhood has the layout to get the party started. Dine outside, where the double-sided fireplace partially separates the alfresco setting from the pool/hot tub lounge. Take your drink for a walk and mingle, flowing-freely from inside to out. Later, move the party a few minutes uptown to the Sunset Strip.Lush hedges outline the open-air main level of this modern-contemporary home, making sure your VIPs enjoy a secluded environment. Floor-to-ceiling openings link the pool deck, lawns, and outdoor lounge areas to the open-concept main floor, where creamy-tones set a calming atmosphere. Inside, state of the art tech-features and a chef-worthy kitchen show off Melrose’s modern side, while gorgeous marble and ornate fixtures add that classic-Hollywood elegance. On less formal occasions, fire up the barbecue, grab a drink and get the big game on the terrace TV.Wake up early and start your day with a long walk across Venice Beach. When you’re ready for breakfast, you’ll find dozens of bakeries and patio restaurants on the streets just off the sand. After a morning coffee and a croissant, meander through the Venice neighborhood’s boutique shops to find the perfect souvenir. Still in the mood to shop? Rodeo Drive is just a few minutes from home. And, if you’re traveling with kids, do a little thrill-seeking on the rides at Universal Studios or Santa Monica Pier.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A glass kitchen wall unfolds to views of Colorado’s Flat Top Mountains at this bright modern-mountain home in Steamboat Springs. It’s tucked behind a grassy rise for a private feel in the front; in the back, slopes and sky stretch out before the deck. Walk to Trailhead Lodge and drive 4 minutes to the Steamboat Ski Resort base. Get your fill of the mountain air on a pergola-covered deck with an alfresco sitting area and barbecue. You’re also welcome to use the heated outdoor swimming pool, 3 outdoor hot tubs, and firepit at Trailhead Lodge. Stretch out in the lodge’s fitness center and face off against friends and family in the games room. Tall ceilings, oversized windows, and cool grey tones give this luxury property a bright, airy vibe. It’s laid out around an open-concept great room with a sitting area overseen by a playful bear artwork, a dining table for 6, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar that opens to the deck. Let kids watch a movie in the separate lower-level living area while the grown-ups sip something from the wine fridge. This vacation rental’s 4 bedrooms are spread out over 3 levels. If you’ve brought the whole gang on holiday, there are 2 available bedrooms with twin-over-double bunk beds. Grab gear from the mudroom or 1-car garage and walk to Trailhead Lodge to board the Wildhorse Gondola for Gondola Square and its ski school, honeymoon-worthy restaurants, and lively apres-ski scene. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Thoughtful modern design and a convenient slope-side location make Dwell on Woodside an easy choice for a relaxed ski holiday. Set on a ski run and just steps from Park City’s charming downtown, this luxury vacation rental couldn’t make it simpler to spend your days on the trails and your evenings exploring the area.You’ll want to spend most of your stay skiing, hiking or otherwise enjoying Utah’s incredible natural scenery. But when you return to Dwell on Woodside, step onto the private balcony for a soak in the hot tub or to prep dinner on the barbecue. Inside, you can relax in front of the fireplace with a selection from the wine fridge or share snaps of your trip over the house’s Wi-Fi.The villa’s interiors are an intriguing mix of old and new, traditional and contemporary. Though the beamed, vaulted ceilings, stone mantel and iron chandelier of the living room bring to mind stately European estates, the plush sofas, playful beanbag chair and colorful glass art have a more relaxed feel. Slipcovered chairs seat up to eight at the dining table, and drafting stools offer four more perches—and a great view of the artwork—at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.If you’ve come out West for the skiing, you’ll appreciate the walk-in/walk-out access to Park City Mountain Resort and the 5-minute drive to Deer Valley Resort. You’re also just a short walk from downtown Park City, which has everything from the playful Park Silly Sunday Market and quaint historic architecture to honeymoon-worthy restaurants and lively nightlife. Other local sights include the Swaner Preserve and EcoCenter and Utah Olympic Park, and if it’s not a true getaway without golf, you’ll find a course just 2.5 miles away. When it’s time to leave, stop in to see the up-and-coming scene in downtown Salt Lake City on your way to the airport there.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

For more information, please contact a villa specialist.Located on a quiet corner next to the heart of Old Town, this cozy alpine retreat boasts sweeping mountain and city views from multiple lookout points. Elegant décor, distinctive furniture, and dark hardwood flooring flows throughout. The elegant abode is just a short walk away from dining, shopping and nightlife on historic Main Street and mere steps to the slopes at Park City Mountain Resort. Vaulted ceilings alongside soaring windows enhance the open-concept space. Perfect for entertaining, the gourmet kitchen area features ceramic tiles, stone countertops, and eye-catching pendant lights. The sun-drenched main living area is a comfortable, bright place to gather. Sliding glass doors lead out to your private, high-reaching oasis where the crisp air is undeniably refreshing. Take a seat, uncork a bottle of wine, and get lost in the vivid sunsets that disappear behind the expansive vista. After a day of hitting the slopes, secure your spot on the sectional sofa and catch a game or watch a favourite flick in the media room. The family room is fully stocked with an assortment of board games so you can challenge your crew to a competitive (yet fun) evening. Give into total après-ski relaxation in the private hot tub, tucked away on the lower level, adjacent to the outdoor fire pit. During warmer months, hiking and biking trails can be explored, golf can be played, and the luge-like Alpine Slide is ready to give you a boost of adrenaline. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Brand new timber architecture and luxury amenities frame stunning mountain views at The Overlook Chalet. This recently built Breckenridge vacation rental has beautifully appointed entertaining spaces and six bedrooms with space for up to twenty-two friends and family. Its location in the Peak 8 area puts you close to skiing, plus shopping and dining on the town’s Main Street.Spacious outdoor living areas let you make the most of the Colorado summer, with a private deck, al-fresco dining for eight, plus an outdoor fireplace and hot tub for cooler evenings. If you’ll be visiting during cooler weather, leave gear in the mudroom and unwind by the wet bar, TV and sound system, or around the pool table and collection of arcade games.Inside The Overlook Chalet, soaring ceilings and an open-concept layout mean you can enjoy the views from the living room, dining area and fully equipped kitchen. Cozy up to the gas fireplace on the sofa or loveseat, claim a stool at the breakfast bar and chat with the chef, or sit down to satisfy après-ski appetites at the elegant dining table.The chalet has four bedrooms with king beds, including two master suites with fireplaces and balconies, one of which even has a honeymoon-worthy jetted tub. The fifth bedroom is a bunk room perfect for kids, with three double bunk beds, and the sixth bedroom has a trundle bed. All the bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.Whether you’ll be exploring the mountains on skis or on foot, a holiday at The Overlook Chalet makes it easy. The villa is just over a 5-minute walk to the nearest ski run, and a short drive from the Breckenridge Ski Resort base, the BreckConnect gondola and Copper Mountain. Go sledding and tubing at nearby Carter Park or, in warmer weather, play a round at Breckenridge Golf Club. For shopping and dining, make the short drive to Main Street in charming central Breckenridge.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Carve the fresh powder of Park City Mountain Resort and walk home to barbecue dinners and hot tub soaks at this superb contemporary residence. Situated in the prestigious Old Town neighborhood, the 3-story home has everything you need for an alpine getaway with family and friends. Enjoy home-cooked feasts after an adventurous day and head over to Main Street for some of the finest apres-ski nightlife in the Rocky Mountains.Powder Watch is centered around an open-concept living room with gourmet kitchen. Large windows fill the space with natural daylight and evening alpenglow, while beautiful wood trusses evoke the rustic charm of old Park City. Sip hot cocoa by the fire and put on a movie. For a little more privacy, the master suite, on the lower level, features its own fireplace and balcony with inspiring views of the ski slopes.There is hardly a finer location in Park City for travellers seeking that perfect balance of privacy and proximity. The villa’s ski storage room and garage are about 150 yards from the base of the mountain at Quttin’ Time run, and an easy walk from the restaurants, bars, and music venues of Historic Main Street. Park City Golf Course is also within easy reach by car. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: There’s a certain style of rugged-luxury that exists in the Napa Valley, and this breezy wine country-home captures it perfectly. Spend your nights under the stars, tasting all the local vineyards best creations while the fire warms you. Use the trendy kitchen to craft locally-inspired meals. But First, head 4-minutes into Saint Helena to pick up some fresh produce from the farmer’s market.A-list interior decorator, Jay Jeffers, crafts a unique mixture of contemporary furnishings, antiques, and bold patterns, accents walls, and works of art in Casa Pelota. Sure to spark conversation, your dinner parties and social occasions will easily benefit from the vibrant decor. Especially when the terrace doors are slid open and the hosting space doubles.Feeling active? Swim a few laps in the pool or challenge a friend to a match on the bocce court. After, celebrate your victory by recharging your batteries in the soothing hot tub. Depending on your vibe, Casa Pelota’s formal and alfresco dining tables are perfect on nights in; both have seating for 6. After dinner, turn up the sound system, get a fire going, and try a few more local wines.First thing’s first, get out and find your new favorite vineyard. Napa Bike Tours and the Napa Wine Train are great ways to see a wide selection of wineries, and they don’t require a car. Then, dine at Harvest Table, a restaurant that prides itself on locally sourced ingredients and a beautiful terrace setting. After dinner, catch a flick at Cameo Cinema, which has been open since 1913.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stay in the heart of Steamboat Springs at Ambassadors Penthouse 403. This beautiful Colorado vacation rental in the Olympian complex is just minutes from shopping, dining and the town’s namesake hot springs. In the winter, a complimentary shuttle whisks guests to Steamboat Ski Resort. Book this modern, open-plan property for a laid-back vacation with family or a ski getaway with friends.The penthouse opens to a private wraparound deck with views of the Yampa River, Howelsen Hill and Emerald Mountain. There are al-fresco sitting and dining areas, a barbecue and a hot tub big enough for six—plus a built-in heating system that keeps snow off the deck. Inside, a wet bar, wine cooler and espresso machine make entertaining a breeze, while a fireplace, flat-screen television and Wi-Fi make for cozy, quieter nights in.The views are just as impressive through the floor-to-ceiling windows in the great room, too. The open-plan space has room for everyone to gather and enjoy each other’s company, whether on the sectional in front of the fireplace or in the soft leather chairs around the dining table. Custom cabinets and granite countertops make the fully equipped kitchen both beautiful and practical, and a breakfast bar is convenient for both morning espressos and après-ski snacks.The three bedrooms at this luxury villa continue the spacious, modern ambience. A master suite with a king bed and an en-suite bathroom couldn’t be more welcoming after a day on the slopes or the golf course. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and two twin beds, respectively, and share a bathroom—the perfect setup for parents and younger kids on holiday together.Known for its challenging ski runs and lively nightlife, Steamboat Springs also has plenty of outdoor adventure, from fishing and kayaking to rafting, golf and hiking. At the end of a day out in the mountain air, soak tired muscles in the family-friendly Old Town hot springs, a 5-minute walk from the villa, or enjoy a romantic evening in the honeymoon-worthy natural pools at Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Feel the ocean breeze and warm Californian sun flowing throughout this airy and open smart home in Carmel-by-the-Sea. Make an afternoon snack in the chef’s kitchen, mix a cocktail at the wet bar, or just curl up by the fire, all while basking in the fresh air. Wake up early to golf at Spyglass Hill, then walk 5 minutes to Carmel Beach and cool off. Not done golfing? Pebble Beach is 6 minutes away.A white interior gives off a European-feel, and the spiral staircase from the patio to the balcony makes it unmistakably French-inspired. Fans of organization will appreciate the corner kitchens stove and shelving units built-in to the staircase above. As well as the functionality of the island sink/breakfast bar. A simple yet elegant collection of furniture sets a refreshing, minimalistic tone.Spend your nights dining alfresco with friends. After dinner, move the party to the balcony and sip cocktails while the sunsets. Warm yourself on cooler nights by gathering around one of 2 outdoor fireplace lounge areas, or hop into the hot tub for a refreshing soak while you do some star gazing. Inside, the kids can watch movies on the widescreen. Unleash your inner photographer at Carmel Beach, where the crashing of waves onto cypress-lined, white-sand shores will surely inspire a landscape picture or two. After a day on the beach, treat yourself to dinner at one of Carmel’s French restaurants, Bouchee and Grasings are 2 local favorites. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Terra Nova is an unforgettable property nestled in the heart of Sonoma Valley. Located on 3 acres of beautifully landscaped natural abundance, the lovely five-bedroom villa draws its influences from Mediterranean villas with subtle accents that are pure wine country contemporary. The exterior features earth tones and an infusion of natural materials, allowing the villa to blend in perfectly with its pastoral surroundings. Best of all, you won’t have to go far to begin your appreciation of America’s best wineries.A majestic oak anchors the circular driveway, its boughs waving hello. You’ll find numerous outdoor living spaces surrounding the villa. A range of patios, verandas, and terraces provide you with distinct - and distinguished - settings for enjoying the beauty of the countryside. One patio, extending from the kitchen, sheltered by an arched ceiling, features a cozy dining alcove with a stone fireplace. Another outdoor terrace houses a lengthy al fresco table where you and your guests can enjoy leisurely brunches and dining under the stars.Inside, the large great room is a sight to behold. Stunning antiques and carefully selected furnishings create an elegant and welcome ambiance. Feel a fresh breeze wind its way through French doors, as you relax on ultra-comfortable sofas and chairs. At the head of the great room, with a massive stone fireplace, an immense wooden dining table awaits any banquet you may wish to serve, or you can choose to enjoy the services of Villa Terra Nova private chefs or Sonoma County caterers. Sonoma Valley’s reputation for food cannot be overstated, and Villa Terra Nova’s professional grade kitchen will allow you to make the most of locally-sourced ingredients. You’ll find five spectacular bedrooms in the villa, individually decorated with a particular color in mind. The spacious Master suite features an office, walk-in closet and spacious en-suite bathroom with soaking tub and rain shower overlooking an enclosed garden featuring seasonal colors. Three of the Villa's guest bedrooms have their own en-suite bathroom as well.The property is a mere 4 miles from the historic Sonoma Plaza, where shops, restaurants and cafés await you. From there you can start your tour of the Sonoma tasting trails, selecting from hundreds of world-class wineries and iconic wine country towns that not only offer fine wine, but unforgettable culinary experiences year-round. Located in the center of the Sonoma Valley, guests are within minutes of nearby Kenwood and Glen Ellen with a scenic 30 minute drive to the Napa Valley.Sonoma County Vacation Rental TOT Certificate #1047NCopyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located on Malibu’s prestigious coast, this incredible five-bedroom enjoys its own private slice, inaccessible by the public, of Las Flores Beach. With endless views of the Pacific Ocean from its multi-level balcony and spacious interior, Beachfront Beauty is perfect for a family getaway, vacation with friends, and any other occasion worth celebrating in style. Nearby, you’ll love the relaxed beach community atmosphere of Malibu, right with high-end shopping, fine dining, and vibrant nightlife. For even more world-class attractions, follow the coast East a few miles to the bustling metropolis of Los Angeles.This stylish villa boasts incredible ocean views and barrier-free access to its many balcony openings, inviting fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight to flow freely within the minimalistic-chic interior. High-end electronics and designer furniture decorate the soothing, creamy tones of the common spaces, while in the kitchen, the state of the art appliances are sure to inspire your inner chef. The master bedroom enjoys a California King-bed, en-suite with jetted tub, a private balcony, and spectacular ocean view.Beachfront Beauty’s estate is split between the four-bedroom Main House, which features panoramic ocean views across its open concept interior and five-level balcony. The fifth bedroom is located in the private Guest House, which is outfitted with two beds, an en-suite, a full kitchen, living area, and ocean view-balcony. The villa features indoor parking for two vehicles, alfresco and formal dining for eight, and the use of kayaks, available on the beachfront.Although you’ve got your own private beachfront, you’ll surely want to check out some of the coast’s other beautifully scenic beach areas, like Santa Monica Pier and Venice Beach, both are just ten miles from home. If you’re in the mood to explore, Topanga State Park is perfect for family hiking excursions. If you’re traveling with kids or the young at heart, Universal Studios is always a great bet. And, of course, Los Angeles, Hollywood, and Beverly Hills are just a few miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located just outside of downtown Phoenix, this private nine bedroom is the perfect home base for a luxurious golf trip with friends, family vacation, or high-end corporate retreat. Valley Vista accommodates up to eighteen guests, and its open concept interior and spacious outdoor areas make it easy for everyone to find their own space, as well as gather together as a group. Nearby, you’ll find Arizona’s most vibrant cities, Scottsdale and Phoenix; both are under ten miles from home. And, if you’re in town to golf, there are numerous courses in the area, many within a ten-minute drive of Valley Vista.Spanish colonial architecture, state of the art electronics, and plush designer furniture combine to create the perfect environment for exciting group gatherings at Valley Vista. With a Smart TV, stereo, Wi-Fi, pool table, and wet bar, you’ll love spending evenings in, creating new memories with old friends.Valley Vista’s terrace and courtyard are decorated with lush desert greenery, beautiful stone columns that support refreshing shaded areas, and elegant water features. You’ll love cooling off in the swimming pool after a long day on the golf course, and at night when it cools down, the hot tub will help you rejuvenate for another day. At dinner, you’ll have the choice between the formal dining area inside or the alfresco set on the terrace; both have great social atmospheres.When it’s time to get out and hit the links, you won’t have to travel far with Paradise Valley, Camelback, Orange Tree, and Talking Sticks golf clubs all within ten miles. Travel a little further, and you’ll find Troon North Golf Club and TPC Scottsdale, two of the best courses in the Scottsdale area. There’s plenty to discover in Phoenix, and a great place to start is Roosevelt Row, an easily walkable stretch of exciting new restaurants, markets, and bars. If you’re in the mood to shop, the Biltmore Fashion Park is home to the World’s best brands and restaurants, and it’s just a few minutes from home.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Ski-in/ski-out access gets you onto the slopes immediately from this ultra-luxe mountain home, aloft in the snowy peaks of renowned ski-resort Deer Valley Resort. Mountain Glade rests within the exclusive gated community of Deer Crest and enjoys panoramic views of the glittering Jordanelle Reservoir.Nine thousand square feet of luxurious living space offers plenty of room for large groups and extended or multiple families to have a ball! Step over the threshold of this magnificent alpine haven and you’ll see why. Acres of natural wood have been put to good effect in making this ski home warm and friendly. Deep-cushioned sofas and leather armchairs invite you to take a seat in the glow of the towering stone fireplace and admire the awe-inspiring views through cathedral-like windows. The vista extends into the neighboring dining room and gourmet marble-topped kitchen with its handy breakfast bar and its chef-ready stainless steel range.Honeyed wood floors, vaulted ceilings and timber clad walls are bathed in natural light from the huge windows while potted plants, comfortable furniture and soft rugs lend a welcoming homely feel to Mountain Glade. The house’s many fireplaces offer cozy resting places after a day on the slopes and there is plenty of entertainment on offer at the family room’s pool table and in the impressive home theater with its stadium seating and beanbags. If you really must work there’s a study with desk and computer, or you can pull a book from the shelf and settle into a fireside leather recliner. Stargazing from the outdoor hot tub is the perfect way to end the day.Six ultra-comfortable spacious bedrooms can easily accommodate up to 17 people and the rustic wood twin bunks are a novelty for kids. Soak away any cares in one of the deluxe en-suite’s deep tubs and settle into bed to dream of your next day’s ski adventures.You can ski directly onto the slopes from Mountain Glade or travel to Main Street Park City which is 10 minutes away. In town you’ll find restaurants and grocery stores as well as golf and tennis courts. The airport is a 44 mile drive.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sophisticated style has come to the rugged Wyoming landscape at Lodge at Shooting Star 4. This beautifully designed vacation rental sits in the shadow of the Tetons, a short drive from golf, skiing and Teton Village. Its three bedrooms are luxury havens for a ski holiday with family, an active getaway with friends or even an adventurous honeymoon in the mountains.Watch the light move across the mountains from a private deck with a barbecue, al-fresco dining for six and a hot tub. Or unwind inside with the help of a media room and wet bar. The villa has a TV and Wi-Fi and, for your comfort and convenience, air conditioning, heating, a fireplace and laundry facilities.Designed by renowned local architect John Carney, the lodge uses natural textures in a modern way for a look that’s both welcoming and stylish. A stone fireplace anchors the open-plan great room, and reclaimed wood cabinetry speaks to the area’s past. A double-height window floods the sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen with light.The villa has two bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with its own gas fireplace, and one bedroom with two twin bunk beds. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms. The cozy media room also has a sofa bed for larger parties or those wanting more flexible accommodations.As part of Shooting Star, an exclusive development next to Jackson Hole Mountain Resort, the lodge has easy access to the community’s award-winning golf course and is only a short walk or shuttle ride from the resort’s ski slopes. Ride down the bike path to the entrance of Grand Teton National Park or, for a memorable day trip, drive to Yellowstone National Park. Find shopping and dining only a 3-minute drive from the villa in Teton Village.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
