listing.listing_description: Grill up some Austin-style barbecue as the kids play on the trampoline at this modern home in West Lake Hills. Ideal for private fun between adventures on the town, the house includes a gourmet kitchen and spacious living and dining areas both inside and out. But don't let the tranquil atmosphere fool you: it's just a mile to Barton Springs Pool and the concerts at Zilker Park, and only 4 miles to Downtown Austin.The house is nestled amid lush greenery framing a generous portion of Texas sky. Enjoy playful afternoons at the basketball hoop or in the grassy yard, or watch the big game on the outdoor TV. Spark the grill in the evening and gather-for lantern-lit dinners around the table for 8.The open-concept interior offers a cool retreat from the summer sun, with stylish yet welcoming furniture and a harmonious palette of blue and orange, mahogany and gold. Watch a favorite show in the lounge, uncork a bottle of wine by the fire, and channel the world-class foodie spirit of Austin in the fully equipped kitchen. Find focus in the office space or retreat into the media room for a nightcap and movie.Perfect for a family or group of friends, the house features a master suite with ensuite bathroom (including a soaking tub), as well as an adult-friendly guest suite with queen bed and ensuite bathroom. The other two guestrooms share a Jack & Jill bathroom between them; each has a queen bed and kid-friendly décor.This West Lake Hills location offers convenient access to the heart of Austin and some of the most beautiful areas of Texas Hill Country. Drive about a mile for a dip in Barton Springs Pool or a show at Zilker Metropolitan Park—one of the prime venues for SXSW and Austin City Limits. Play the fairways of Lions Municipal Golf Course and discover the natural beauty of McKinney Falls State Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Step into luxury at this decadent, central apartment, located in well-regarded Shock Hill, Breckenridge. Outfitted to sharply-contemporary standards, guests can luxuriate amidst stimulating decor, crafted and fashionable furniture, and warm touches like the roaring fireplace. The gondola station for the ski resort is just outside, while the culinary delights of the town are temptingly close by.After a delightful afternoon on the diverse slopes of the Breckenridge resort, guests can hop off at the gondola station and take just a few steps to return to the exceptionally-outfitted interiors of Falcon Haus. Exposed wooden rafters hang above shining wooden floors, with the large windows ensuring fresh sunlight illuminates the impeccable interior. Self-catering is a joy at this villa, with the modern kitchen’s stone counters helping to make mealtime both pleasant and simple. The sitting room is especially welcoming, with TV perched over the glowing gas fireplace, as the ski-run lights shine in the night beyond.With access to the resort comprehensively covered, guests have a wealth of other outing options from Falcon Haus, with the central artery of North Park avenue just around the corner. From here, dive into the restaurant, bar and brewery scene of this energetic mountain town, or go beyond, to explore the forest trails, canyons and lakes of the valley, with hiking, kayaking and mountain-biking all very popular options. Try nearby Carter Park for fun sledding outings, with a hot chocolate from a local artisanal cafe to round things off perfectly. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: K0062 - Yellow Palms - City I.D.#3331 TOT Permit: 3085 Beyond the palm trees, soaring mountain views await at this breezy desert home in Palm Springs. Sip your morning coffee in the backyard lounge. Sit for a leisurely brunch at the kitchen’s breakfast bar or dine around the modern picnic table next to the saltwater pool. Then, take a few shots on the putting green before heading out for a day at one of the many golf courses in the area.Spread across one-level, Yellow Palms many openings to the terrace supply a refreshing and natural ventilation, letting the warm desert air flow in freely. The spacious layout is perfect for a golf vacation or getaway with friends. Vibrant colors add subtle flashes of excitement to the modern-contemporary interior. In the afternoon, challenge a friend to a game of bocce, do some grilling on the barbecue, and throw the big game on the widescreen. At night, the hot tub is the perfect place to recharge your batteries after an exciting day.Start the next morning with a 5-minute walk to the Warm Sands neighborhood for artisan bagels, fresh pastries, and a little shopping at the antique mall. Walk 5-minutes further to the bustling streets of downtown Palm Springs, where even more shopping, restaurants, art galleries, and museums await. If you’re in town for a festival, Yellow Palms is located 5-minutes from Coachella’s Palm Springs shuttle-service.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Capture 180-degree ocean views from the prestigious corner of 7th and Strand, on Manhattan Beach. Steps from the sand, this contemporary villa is the dream boardwalk getaway. The sunny south-facing terrace is the perfect place to work on your tan. When you’re ready to explore, follow the boardwalk downtown for shopping and nightlife. Or, hop on a bike and visit Venice, Redondo, or Santa Monica.The Glass Beach House combines nautical decor with industrial design to create a space that feels at one with its natural surroundings while showing off cutting-edge architecture. From inside, the ocean views are endless. Outside, the social terrace feels at one with the vibrant “walk-streets” in the Manhattan Beach community. The formal dining area quickly becomes alfresco by sliding the ocean-facing door open. After dinner, the kids will love playing in the children’s loft, while you sip wine as the sun sets.If you get lucky, you may spot dolphins, seals, and even grey whales from the beachside terrace. For a closer look, grab a surfboard or stand-up paddleboard from the backyard and hit the ocean. After a morning on the beach, head into LA to do some shopping on Rodeo Drive, or have lunch at The Grove. At night, find a casual pub in Venice or head to one of the legendary clubs on Hollywood’s Sunset Strip.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Pairing a slopeside location with European charm, Chamonix 26 brings you the best of Aspen. This luxury Colorado vacation rental is part of the Chamonix community, and its three suite-style bedrooms can accommodate up to eight guests. Spend your stay taking advantage of the ski-in, ski-out access to Assay Hill or taking the complimentary shuttle into Snowmass Village or downtown Aspen.Guests of Chamonix 26 are welcome to use the shared slopeside ski locker, stretch out in the fitness center or soak in the community pool and hot tub. The community offers bell and concierge service, as well as daily newspaper delivery. For private entertaining, the unit has its own balcony with a barbecue and mountain views, and, inside, a wood-burning fireplace and surround sound system for cozy evenings in.Refined furnishings and an open-plan layout give Chamonix 26 both old-world appeal and modern style. Gather around the fireplace and TV on one of the sofas, or catch up on reading in the armchairs tucked into a bay of windows. There’s plenty more seating around the formal dining table and on the stools at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.Three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms can easily welcome groups of friends or family traveling together. There are two with king beds and ski-slope views, and one with a queen bed and sofa bed. Espresso-toned wood, neutral tones of charcoal and gray, and small sitting areas make the bedrooms inviting places to linger after a day out on the hills.Your holiday at Chamonix 26 includes shuttle service to Snowmass Village and even greater Aspen destinations like the airport. At the end of a day of skiing, make the 20-minute drive to downtown Aspen to browse the boutiques and galleries for the perfect souvenir or to sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner at one of its fine restaurants. For a memorable day trip (or a break from skiing), treat yourself to a few hours at Glenwood Hot Springs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find a haven of modern luxury in the dramatic Arizona landscape at Oasis Estate. Set in the shadows of the McDonald Mountains and Pinnacle Peaks in North Scottsdale, this gated vacation rental is a private enclave of resort-worthy amenities and charming interiors. Its five bedrooms, including one suite in a guest house, are the right size for a golf getaway with friends or a warm-weather birthday or anniversary celebration with the extended family.You’ll want to spend most of your holiday in the villa’s incredible backyard, which features an infinity pool, hot tub, sitting and dining areas, an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue, a fireplace and firepit, sound system and, for sportier guests, a volleyball court, ping-pong table and putting green. If you’d like to entertain indoors, a projector screen, Apple TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi make it easy.With details ranging from carved wooden doors and exposed beams to ornate fireplaces and chandeliers, Oasis Estate blends Southwestern style and European elegance. The rooms radiate out from a central sitting area with a fireplace: a formal dining area, a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and a breakfast nook, and a media room.There are four bedrooms in the estate’s main house and one in a guest house that’s ideal for a couple seeking honeymoon-style privacy or in-laws wanting a little more quiet. The main-house master suite has a king bed, queen bed and two en-suite bathrooms; a second bedroom has two queen beds and an en-suite bathroom. The other two bedrooms have a twin-over-double bunk bed and two queen beds, respectively, and share a bathroom, while the guest house has a king bed and en-suite bathroom.From Oasis Estate, it’s a 5-minute drive to Pinnacle Peak Park and less than a 10-mile drive to two golf courses and the Tom’s Thumb trailhead. You’ll find plenty of other golf courses and spas within easy reach, as well as shopping and dining in downtown Scottsdale.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This magnificent chalet is situated within the Moonlight Basin enclave at Big Sky Resort in Montana, with ski-in/ski-out access to Cinnabar Run. Perched on a hillside with panoramic mountain views, the chalet is perfectly designed for savoring the open-air delights and cozy pleasures of Montana. High-end amenities include an outdoor hot tub, alfresco lounge and dining area, a gourmet kitchen, and a well-equipped game room. Four spacious bedroom suites plus two kid-friendly bunkrooms accommodate families and groups of friends up to twenty in size. At extra cost, guests can enjoy access to Moonlight Basin Clubhouse, including its Jack Nicklaus Signature golf course.The main living room offers a quintessential setting for après-ski relaxation, with double-height ceilings, a beautiful stone hearth, fine timber beams, and ample windows gazing out on breathtaking vistas. The dining table seats eight on lovely leather chairs, and the open kitchen features chef-quality appliances, a generous island with extensive breakfast bar, and a lounge area in a luminous nook.The covered deck features high, peaked ceilings and a wonderful outdoor fireplace, forming a comfortable setting in any season. Downstairs, the mountain-view family room includes a wet bar, TV lounge, fireplace, and tables for foosball and pool. A separate media room includes a large flat-screen TV and another wet bar, and there is also a home office.The master bedroom is on the main level, with a four-poster king bed, panoramic mountain views, and a large fireplace. Its beautiful ensuite bathroom includes a dual vanity, walk-in shower, and a soaking tub perched beneath an antler chandelier. The primary guest suite is upstairs, featuring a king bed, extraordinary views, a fireplace, and an ensuite bathroom with shower and tub. The upstairs bunkrooms accommodate up to eight children. The bottom floor includes two suites: one with a king bed, one with a pair of double beds.The villa has a two-car garage and a ski rom with lockers and boot dyers. You can ski directly on and off the intermediate-friendly Cinnabar Run (the ski-out section is also beginner-friendly), and Powder Run is just a short walk away. Nearby Moonlight Basin Clubhouse features a fitness center, outdoor pool, and extraordinary outdoor sporting opportunities.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: You won’t have to look far for gorgeous views and luxury amenities at Lookout Lodge. From its picturesque Steamboat Springs setting, this custom log home offers mountain vistas stretching from west to south. Its 6,500 square feet of beautifully appointed living space are designed for entertaining, and its five bedrooms can welcome up to sixteen family members or friends.After a day out in the mountains of Colorado, return to your vacation rental to enjoy the sunset from the rooftop deck, dinner from the barbecue at the al-fresco dining table or a soak in the private outdoor hot tub. There’s also a loft with a pool table and wet bar, a family room with a flat-screen television and its own wet bar, and a home theater with a 108-inch screen and tiered seating.The lodge’s spacious interiors pair classic mountain chalet style with state-of-the-art features. The great room, ideal for lounging or a casual meal, is anchored by a massive stone fireplace and boasts panoramic views. It’s open to a fully equipped kitchen with professional-grade appliances, which leads to a dining room set underneath an impressive log truss and a family room with its own fireplace and mountain views.The five bedrooms at Lookout Lodge are spread out over the main and lower levels, making each a quiet, spacious retreat. Relive your honeymoon in one of two bedrooms with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, one of which also has its own balcony. There are two bedrooms with queen beds that share a bathroom, and for children, there’s a bunk room with two bunk beds.Your holiday at the lodge includes on-call seasonal shuttle service, making the 1.6-mile drive to Steamboat Ski Resort a snap. The property is also less than 10 minutes from the Rollingstone Ranch golf course and City Market. Be sure to leave time for a splash in the family-friendly Steamboat Springs Old Town or a soak in the beautiful stone pools of Strawberry Park Hot Springs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Old World Tuscan charm, right in the heart of wine country, Villa Nel Bosco is the Sonoma and Napa Valley vacation of your dreams. Located on the mountain road that divides Napa and Sonoma, this luxurious four-bedroom estate is surrounded by over six-hundred wineries, several star-rated restaurants, and some of California’s most iconic scenery. And, if you feel like a trip to the city, San Francisco and Sacramento are both a little over an hour away.This Tuscan-inspired farmhouse features the authentic shuttered-windows, exposed-beam ceilings, natural stone, and wrought iron fixtures that adorn many of Tuscany’s ancient homes. Inside, soothing earth tones and plush designer furniture will ensure relaxation. Features like the stone fireplace, chandelier lighting, and rustic-chic dining table give Nel Bosco a traditional feel, while high-end electronics and appliances provide modern luxury.With a view of the vineyard, expertly manicured gardens, and a fire pit/lounge, Nel Bosco’s backyard is a perfect example of the stylish, yet rugged vibe of Napa and Sonoma Valley. In the afternoon, cool off in the swimming pool. At night, switch to the hot tub to warm up and melt your stress away. For dinner, you’ll have the choice between the formal dining area inside or the alfresco set on the terrace; both have seating for eight. Back inside, the villa is equipped with television, a media room, Wi-Fi, and air conditioning.Nearby, you’ll find plenty of wine tasting opportunities at local vineyards, as well as independent cafes, organic food markets, and lots of interesting restaurants in Glen Ellen. If you’re on vacation in the summer, visit Jack London State Historic Park for Transcendence Theatre’s Broadway Under the Stars, featuring performances in the park’s old winery ruins. For nightlife, downtown Napa is the place to be. If there’s a craft beer fan in your group, Napa Valley Brewing Company is a great place to sample some fresh local brews. For live music, check the local listings at the Uptown Theatre and Silo’s.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Make beachfront living part of your California dreamin’ at El Matador Beach House. This contemporary Malibu estate rests on the sands of El Matador State Beach and offers panoramic views of the Pacific from living areas indoors and out. Its location close to golf, parks and more makes it the perfect base to explore greater Los Angeles, and its six bedrooms can accommodate up to eight friends or family members.Perched on the oceanfront behind the gates of an exclusive community, this luxury vacation rental practically has its toes in the water. Enjoy the views from several levels of terraces featuring lounge furniture, a barbecue and an al-fresco dining table. The villa also features an indoor spa area with a private lap pool, hot tub and sauna.Contemporary architecture and modern furnishings give El Matador Beach House a vibe of breezy seaside chic. Double-height ceilings and large windows fill the rooms with sunshine, while thoughtful layouts divide them into more intimate nooks. Though the bright, airy living and dining rooms share a wall, they’re separated by a short flight of steps. The fully equipped kitchen is equally bright thanks to a bank of skylights, but practical, too, with state-of-the-art appliances and a breakfast nook and bar.Relive your honeymoon in the villa’s master bedroom, which has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, two fireplaces, a lounge area and a furnished balcony overlooking the ocean. There are two other bedrooms with queen beds and en-suite bathrooms, one of which has a jetted tub, and two bedrooms with shared bathrooms: one with a double bed, and one with a queen bed and kitchenette.A Malibu holiday is perfect for relaxing on the beach or taking advantage of the region’s activities. Try out surfing at one of the five beaches within 12 miles—or head to Malibu Pier for lunch at its trendy restaurant. The villa is just a short drive from the fairways of Perenchio Golf Course and the trails of Topanga State Park, as well as from more cultural attractions like the Getty Villa and Getty Center.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
